analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/45/0x54a91ab8c30c54a86ec7f4cce9b82f073fde9c8c.sol#323-339) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/45/0x54a91ab8c30c54a86ec7f4cce9b82f073fde9c8c.sol#337-338)

Crowdsale.rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x54a91ab8c30c54a86ec7f4cce9b82f073fde9c8c.sol#294)
Crowdsale.wallet should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x54a91ab8c30c54a86ec7f4cce9b82f073fde9c8c.sol#288-291)
RefundableCrowdsale.goal should be constant (/unique_chucks/45/0x54a91ab8c30c54a86ec7f4cce9b82f073fde9c8c.sol#451-453)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/45/0x54a91ab8c30c54a86ec7f4cce9b82f073fde9c8c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/45/0x54a91ab8c30c54a86ec7f4cce9b82f073fde9c8c.sol#1): it allows old versions
